attributes.action: require the removal or resignation of Sir Ian Blair from the office of Commissioner, The Metropolitan Police, London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Ian Blair, has since his appointment in office, transformed the worlds oldest Police force into a haven of Political correctness and his uninspirational leadership has caused immense damage to the moral and effectiveness of Officers in his charge. He has lost the respect and confidence of many officers and Londoners alike.
